exception in log

The full stack trace in log.

Please investigate proper solution for 1.5.3. 
We'd like to be sure RDB dependancies are removed (or, at least well understood) by that time. 

Is this something that could be "contributed" by whatever datatools is is present? 

If not that, perhaps we could have some logic that looked for either?

Can I ask why this is targeted for  153?

This is expected in R2.0 because the component is being removed.
This view needs to be removed or contributed another way - but I don't see the issue in 153

We'd like to be sure RDB dependancies are removed (or, at least well
understood) by 1.5.3. In order to make sure all is well for removing it 
in 2.0, I'd like to understand the solution before 1.5.3 is finished, in case something must be done to provide an evolutionary solution. For example, if database providers do have to make a contribution to this perspective, then 1.5.3 is RDB's "last chance". 

Depending on what you propose as the solution, you may be right ... maybe no change in 1.5.3, which is why I say "at least well understood". Do you have a solution in mind? Or is it obvious, and I just don't see it?
This has been dropped a few weeks ago  (can't find the defect)   but we now cjeck for the existance of the view id before adding.
